QuestData.Title: The Absent-Minded Artisan
QuestData.Description:
Of all the foolhardy, misguided, exasperating...
<Guardian Kota snorts and stomps a hoof.>
But standing here does Sha'lor no good. We must find him and bring him back safely.
Come, meet me at the Autumnal Rise. We can survey the burrows below and see if there is any sign that he lives.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Master Sha'lor on the Autumnal Rise.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Guardian Kota at the Autumnal Rise.
